page.title: 10The Job Centre, Hemsworth
page.content: In our interview with the Job Centre staff we found out that there are two hundred and sixty vacancies in the Hemsworth area. Terry's factory is the largest employer in Hemsworth. Ninety per cent of the jobs in Hemsworth are for women so most men have to commute to their place of work. Young people at the moment are unlucky when trying to find a position as most of the vacancies are for older experienced people. In some instances the rate of pay for a man is less than the amount paid by The Department of Social Security to support a married couple.
